name: Eat Up, Little One
description:
Eat Up, Little One
  • aim cookies with the Mouse, and fire with LMB
  • get all the creatures to the same size by feeding them cookies
  • 6 levels to solve
  • 5-15 minutes of playtime
Credits
  • welby - Lead Programmer
  • helixcube - Programmer
  • blueeyedrat - Programmer
  • discourteous md - Project Idea-Man, Manager, and Producer
  • weepingcat - Music Producer - [Website]
  • eyepox - Idea and Concept Developer

Assets Used:

  • dino characters - https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters
  • cookie heart - https://kicked-in-teeth.itch.io/cookies
  • sky and page background - https://caniaeast.itch.io/simple-sky-pixel-backgrounds
  • tile map for sea and land - https://blueapollo.itch.io/16x16-forest-tileset
  • font - Yoster Island - https://www.1001fonts.com/yoster-island-font.html
